examples: He followed a strict diet.
She valued the high nutritional content and low-calorie nature of asparagus in his diet.

words.defineEn: a set of food that is eaten to keep healthy, thin, etc.
words.defineVi: một bộ thực phẩm được ăn để giữ sức khỏe, mỏng, vv

examples: Dietary experts can advise on the ins and outs of dieting.
He baked a gluten-free almond cake for his friend with dietary restrictions.
The bakery offered gluten-free options for customers with dietary restrictions.
Baobab fruit is a great source of dietary fiber, which helps support a healthy digestive system.
The restaurant offered a diverse menu to cater to different tastes and dietary restrictions - horses for courses.
words.defineEn: contained in or related to one's diet
words.defineVi: chứa trong hoặc liên quan đến chế độ ăn uống của một người

examples: She attends a workshop on animal nutrition, learning about the importance of incorporating meal into livestock diets.

The coach reminded his team that an empty sack cannot stand upright, emphasizing the importance of proper nutrition for optimal athletic performance.
- That's nutrition.

words.defineEn: food that is essential to one's growth and health
words.defineVi: thực phẩm cần thiết cho sự tăng trưởng và sức khỏe của một người

examples: She packed a nutritious lunchbox for her children, including finger millet crackers with a creamy hummus dip.

words.defineVi: (thực phẩm) chứa các chất tốt cho sự phát triển và sức khỏe của cơ thể

examples: She climbed the greasy pole to become the CEO.

This is greasy.
That is greasy.
words.defineEn: (of food) containing or cooked in a lot of oil
words.defineVi: (của thực phẩm) chứa hoặc nấu trong rất nhiều dầu

examples: But I'm not really into the low-carb movement, and, ah, they've made bowls out of bread.

words.defineEn: (of food or a diet) having or containing fewer carbohydrates
words.defineVi: (của thực phẩm hoặc chế độ ăn kiêng) có hoặc chứa ít carbohydrate hơn

examples: Lisa's upset stomach caused her to be off her food, and she struggled to find anything appetizing.

- It don't look good, it don't look appetizing.
- Ooh, now-- - Boy, that sounds appetizing.
words.defineEn: causing one to feel thirsty or hungry
words.defineVi: khiến người ta cảm thấy khát hoặc đói

examples: We had a side salad with our main course for a balanced meal.
With a balanced diet, regular exercise, and a positive mindset, Alex maintains being up to the mark in terms of his overall well-being.

words.defineEn: keeping or demonstrating a state of balance, with equal or proportionate amounts
words.defineVi: giữ hoặc thể hiện trạng thái cân bằng, với số lượng bằng nhau hoặc tương ứng

words.defineEn: (of food) likely to cause one to gain weight
words.defineVi: (của thực phẩm) có khả năng làm cho một người tăng cân

examples: I enjoy adding low-fat milk to my morning cereal for a creamy and nutritious start to the day.

I've always liked low-fat milk.
To be quite honest with you, it is low-fat milk.

words.defineEn: (of food or a diet) having a low or lower amount of fat
words.defineVi: (của thực phẩm hoặc chế độ ăn kiêng) có lượng chất béo thấp hoặc thấp hơn

examples: I spent a year travelling abroad, and I lived on the smell of an oily rag to get by.

words.defineEn: (of food) containing a lot of oil
words.defineVi: (của thực phẩm) chứa nhiều dầu

examples: The car ahead of me jumped the light.

words.defineEn: (of food) low in sugar, fat, or other rich ingredients, which makes it easily digestible

examples: The rich family owned a private jet.

words.defineEn: (of food) containing much fat, sugar, etc.

examples: Avocado's high fiber content can aid in digestion and help promote a healthy gut.

words.defineEn: a process in the body in which food is broken into small substances to be absorbed
words.defineVi: một quá trình trong cơ thể trong đó thức ăn được chia thành các chất nhỏ để được hấp thụ

examples: Dogs can absolutely digest grains.

words.defineVi: để phân hủy thức ăn trong cơ thể và hấp thụ chất dinh dưỡng và các chất cần thiết

examples: The parade is the first sign of the new regime flexing its military muscles.
Most of the country has fallen to the brutal regime, but there remains several pockets of resistance determined to hold out until the bitter end.

The Putin regime is a mafia state.
words.defineEn: a set of instructions given to someone regarding what they should eat or do to maintain or restore their health
words.defineVi: một tập hợp các hướng dẫn được đưa ra cho ai đó về những gì họ nên ăn hoặc làm để duy trì hoặc phục hồi sức khỏe của họ

examples: It'll give you an appetite.

words.defineEn: the feeling of wanting food
words.defineVi: cảm giác muốn ăn

examples: Consuming prunes may have a positive impact on heart health by reducing LDL cholesterol levels.
Breadfruit is heart-healthy and good for your heart because it has low fat and no cholesterol.
In fact, our bodies make steroids out of cholesterol.
So cholesterol can be pretty cool.
Steroids get their name from the fatty molecule cholesterol.
words.defineEn: a substance high in fat found in blood and most body tissues, a high amount of which correlates with an increased risk of heart disease
words.defineVi: một chất có hàm lượng chất béo cao được tìm thấy trong máu và hầu hết các mô cơ thể, một lượng lớn chất béo này tương quan với việc tăng nguy cơ mắc bệnh tim

examples: Eggs are a great source of protein.

words.defineEn: a substance found in food such as meat, eggs, seeds, etc., which is an essential part of the diet and keeps the body strong and healthy
words.defineVi: một chất có trong thực phẩm như thịt, trứng, hạt, v.v., là một phần thiết yếu của chế độ ăn uống và giữ cho cơ thể khỏe mạnh

examples: Asparagus beanare rich in iron and vitamin K.

words.defineEn: natural substances that are found in food, which the body needs in small amounts to remain healthy, such as vitamin A, B, etc.

examples: Avocado's high fiber content can aid in digestion and help promote a healthy gut.

words.defineEn: a particular substance is some food that makes the stomach and bowels work better, which results in a healthier body
words.defineVi: một chất cụ thể là một số thực phẩm làm cho dạ dày và ruột hoạt động tốt hơn, dẫn đến một cơ thể khỏe mạnh hơn

examples: I've been as regular as clockwork ever since I started eating a healthier balance of protein, fiber, and carbohydrates.

words.defineEn: a substance that contains or consists of hydrogen, oxygen, and carbon that provide heat and energy for the body, such as starch or sugar

examples: He decided to use saccharin in his tea instead of sugar to reduce his calorie intake.
